Main API (dca)

The main API provides simple, high-level functions for decline curve analysis.

decline_analysis.dca.forecast(series, model='arps', kind='hyperbolic', horizon=12, verbose=False)[source]
Return type:

Series

decline_analysis.dca.evaluate(y_true, y_pred)[source]
Return type:

dict

decline_analysis.dca.plot(y, yhat, title='Forecast', filename=None)[source]
decline_analysis.dca.benchmark(df, model='arps', kind='hyperbolic', horizon=12, well_col='well_id', date_col='date', value_col='oil_bbl', top_n=10, verbose=False)[source]
Return type:

DataFrame

decline_analysis.dca.sensitivity_analysis(param_grid, prices, opex, discount_rate=0.1, t_max=240, econ_limit=10.0, dt=1.0)[source]

Run sensitivity analysis across Arps parameters and oil/gas prices.

Parameters:

  • param_grid (List[Tuple[float, float, float]]) – List of (qi, di, b) tuples to test

  • prices (List[float]) – List of oil/gas prices to test

  • opex (float) – Operating cost per unit

  • discount_rate (float) – Annual discount rate (default 0.10)

  • t_max (float) – Time horizon in months (default 240)

  • econ_limit (float) – Minimum economic production rate (default 10.0)

  • dt (float) – Time step in months (default 1.0)

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

DataFrame with sensitivity results including EUR, NPV, and payback

decline_analysis.dca.economics(production, price, opex, discount_rate=0.1)[source]

Calculate economic metrics from production forecast.

Parameters:

  • production (Series) – Monthly production forecast

  • price (float) – Unit price ($/bbl or $/mcf)

  • opex (float) – Operating cost per unit

  • discount_rate (float) – Annual discount rate (default 0.10)

Return type:

Dict

Returns:

Dictionary with NPV, cash flow, and payback period

decline_analysis.dca.reserves(params, t_max=240, dt=1.0, econ_limit=10.0)[source]

Generate production forecast and compute EUR (Estimated Ultimate Recovery).

Parameters:

  • params (ArpsParams) – Arps decline parameters (qi, di, b)

  • t_max (float) – Time horizon in months (default 240)

  • dt (float) – Time step in months (default 1.0)

  • econ_limit (float) – Minimum economic production rate (default 10.0)

Return type:

Dict

Returns:

Dictionary with forecast, time arrays, and EUR

decline_analysis.dca.load_ndic_data(months_list, output_dir='ndic_raw')[source]

Load North Dakota Industrial Commission (NDIC) production data.

Parameters:

  • months_list (List[str]) – List of month strings (e.g., [‘2023-01’, ‘2023-02’])

  • output_dir (str) – Directory to save raw data files (default ‘ndic_raw’)

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

Combined DataFrame with production data
